scripts.pipeline:create: . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name $SHOP_APP_STACK_NAME-pipeline --template-body file://infrastructure/codepipeline.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ProjectName,ParameterValue=$PROJECT ParameterKey=GitBranchName,ParameterValue=$GIT_BRANCH ParameterKey=FullRepositoryId,ParameterValue=$FULL_REPOSITORY_ID
scripts.pipeline:update: . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name $SHOP_APP_STACK_NAME-pipeline --template-body file://infrastructure/codepipeline.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ProjectName,ParameterValue=$PROJECT ParameterKey=GitBranchName,ParameterValue=$GIT_BRANCH ParameterKey=FullRepositoryId,ParameterValue=$FULL_REPOSITORY_ID
scripts.sam:sync: sam sync --template-file infrastructure/template.yaml --stack-name shop --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --watch
